about.benefits: For students, the platform offers an easy way to mark their attendance and track their participation history. Teachers benefit from automated attendance management, allowing them to focus more on teaching and less on administrative tasks.
about.description: Metropolia Attendance is a comprehensive attendance tracking system specifically designed for Metropolia University of Applied Sciences. This platform represents a significant step forward in modernizing how we manage and record student participation in academic activities.
about.modernization: Our system streamlines the traditional attendance-taking process, replacing manual paper-based methods with an efficient digital solution. It provides real-time tracking, automated reporting, and seamless integration with Metropolia's existing digital infrastructure.
about.title: About Metropolia Attendance app

connection.description: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the page
connection.title: Connection Issues?

iphone.description: If using an iPhone, make sure to disable iCloud Private Relay as it may interfere with VPN connectivity. You can disable it in Settings > Apple ID > iCloud > Private Relay.
iphone.title: Issues with iPhone?

login.description: Make sure you are connected to Metropolia network or VPN
login.title: Cannot Log In?

scaling.description: This website is built using 100% display scaling in mind. If your device uses different scaling settings, the content might appear too big or too small. Adjust your browser zoom or system display scaling for optimal viewing.
scaling.title: Display Scaling Issues?

contact.description: If you need additional assistance, please contact Metropolia support:
contact.title: Need More Help?

gettingStarted.description: To use this application, you need to have:
gettingStarted.item2: Access to Metropolia network or VPN
gettingStarted.item3: Google Chrome browser (recommended for best experience)
gettingStarted.pwa: This application is built as a Progressive Web App (PWA) optimized for Chrome. For the best experience, we recommend using Chrome browser where you can install it as a desktop application. On mobile devices, you can add the app to your home screen: on Android, tap the menu (â‹®) and select "Add to Home screen", on iOS tap the share button and choose "Add to Home Screen".
gettingStarted.title: Getting Started

navigation.helpMessage: Need help? Click the help button above to get started!
